Articles.Content:
I have a mechjeb on my debris and I can switch to it and throttle up/down but I have no steering any more. Not sure why all of a sudden. I can use translatron and smart ASS but they don\'t actually rotate my ship like it use to. RCS/SAS on/off makes no difference.

It just seems like my WASD keys simply don\'t work unless a CM is atached. Just me?

I\'m sure my mechjeb debris use to have steering. Am I imagining that?

Frankly, I\'ve got so many different types of craft for different purposes I\'ve lost track!

Should mechjeb debris be steerable with WASD?

Yes, Mech jeb should be able to move debris, one of the best features =P

I can\'t rotate now either
Okay. Page 25 in the mechjeb thrad points this as a known peoblem. I not going mad after all. Lock thread pls. Thx.
